testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Search Result Page for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Index Search Linked Clicked User clicked on the Index Search Link

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by term "cancer"

substeps.message: Search result pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

On 'SearchResult' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'relatedContent' with the key 'search.relatedContent' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Related Content are NOT matching

On 'SearchResult' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'predictor.label' with the key 'predictor.label' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???????? and the Content displayed on UI Timeline & Success Rates are NOT matching
